params._childSkillIndex: For the domain in which the motion is occurring
params._permissionDomainId: The domain where the extension has the arbitration permission
params._staker: The staker whose reward is being claimed
params._vote: The side being supported (0 = NAY, 1 = YAY)

params._action: A bytes array encoding a function call
params._childSkillIndex: The childSkillIndex pointing to the domain of the action
params._domainId: The domain where we vote on the motion
params._key: Reputation tree key for the domain
params._value: Reputation tree value for the domain

params._action: A bytes array encoding a function call
params._altTarget: The contract to which we send the action (0x0 for the colony)
params._key: Reputation tree key for the root domain
params._value: Reputation tree value for the root domain

params._childSkillIndex: For the current domain, relative to the escalated domain
params._key: Reputation tree key for the new domain
params._value: Reputation tree value for the new domain

params._structHash: The hash of the expenditureId or expenditureId*expenditureSlot

params._actionHash: The hash of the particular expenditure action

returns._0: The largest past vote on this variable

params._vote: The side being supported (0 = NAY, 1 = YAY)

returns._0: The staker reward and the reputation penalty (if any)

params._voterRep: The reputation the voter has in the domain

params._escalationPeriod: The length of the escalation period in seconds
params._maxVoteFraction: The fraction of the domain's reputation which must submit for quick-end
params._revealPeriod: The length of the reveal period in seconds
params._stakePeriod: The length of the staking period in seconds
params._submitPeriod: The length of the submit period in seconds
params._totalStakeFraction: The fraction of the domain's reputation we need to stake
params._userMinStakeFraction: The minimum per-user stake as fraction of total stake
params._voterRewardFraction: The fraction of the total stake paid out to voters as rewards

params._key: Reputation tree key for the staker/domain
params._salt: The salt used to hash the vote
params._value: Reputation tree value for the staker/domain

params._amount: The amount of tokens being staked

createDomainMotion(uint256,uint256,bytes.notice: Create a motion in any domain

createRootMotion(address,bytes,bytes,byt.notice: Create a motion in the root domain

deprecate(bool).notice: Called when deprecating (or undeprecating) the extension

escalateMotion(uint256,uint256,uint256,b.notice: Escalate a motion to a higher domain

getExpenditureMotionCount(bytes32).notice: Get the number of ongoing motions for a single expenditure / expenditure slot

getExpenditurePastVote(bytes32).notice: Get the largest past vote on a single expenditure variable

getMotion(uint256).notice: Get the data for a single motion

getMotionState(uint256).notice: Get the current state of the motion

getStake(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Get a user's stake on a motion

getUserMinStakeFraction().notice: Get the user min stake fraction

identifier().notice: Returns the identifier of the extension

revealVote(uint256,bytes32,uint256,bytes.notice: Reveal a vote secret for a motion

submitVote(uint256,bytes32,bytes,bytes,u.notice: Submit a vote secret for a motion
